text: Emmitt James Smith III (born May 15, 1969 in Pensacola, Florida) is a former National Football League player who played for the Dallas Cowboys and Arizona Cardinals. == Other websites == * Official website *IMG Speakers Official Agents for Emmitt Smith Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American Christians Category:Arizona Cardinals players Category:Dallas Cowboys players Category:College Football Hall of Fame Category:Sportspeople from Florida Category:American football running backs Category:People from Pensacola, Florida
title: Emmitt Smith
